query: SELECT ID, MUID, VersionName, VersionNumber, Version_ID, VersionFlag, Name, Code, ChangeTrackingMask, [Closure Date] as Closure_Date, Company_Code, Company_Name, Company_ID, [Receivables in USD] as Receivables_in_USD, [Inventory in USD] as Inventory_in_USD, [A/P in USD] as AP_in_USD, [Cash in USD] as Cash_in_USD, [Loans in USD] as Loans_in_USD, [Local Hedges in USD] as Local_Hedges_in_USD, [Group Hedges in USD] as Group_Hedges_in_USD, EnterDateTime, EnterUserName, EnterVersionNumber, LastChgDateTime, LastChgUserName, LastChgVersionNumber, ValidationStatus FROM mdm.[Company FX Exposure]
